place_description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

reviews_data.review_text: Got here when they opened, nothing is ready, couldn't get what we wanted, went to the bathroom and it smelled like urine so strongly I couldn't stay in there. I've given this place so many chances but it just continues to disappoint.

It would be nice if they can communicate they are out of everything. This supposed to be a Chipotle Chicken Avocado Melt. Wrong bread, they did not put avocado and I did not even get a bag of chip with my order. Wth! This is the worst location.
Order was incorrect, i received 2 bags of chips instead of baguette. Not sure if they were out of them but it would have been nice to be notified if they were.

To the girl who brought me my food while my newborn baby slept in the car- you are the real MVP! I didn't catch her name, but she made my day! Also- the food was way better than the Cotswold location. The bread was soft! They made it right and I felt like they actually cared. Thank you again! Give that girl a raise!
Panera forgot half of my Uber eats order, and I called to get the situation fixed and they hung up on me twice. Terrible customer service.
they're out of everything.
Awesome breakfast sandwich
My sandwich was fresh, and all my modifications were executed. It was a great breakfast to start my day off just right.
Very friendly staff at this location. I always visit this location when I visit Charlotte because it's clean, in a nice neighborhood and they are so nice and helpful at this location! :)

6/3/24 update service was better and they seem to be staffed better today!  Added some pics!
Staff was friendly, but they were short'-staffed and overall service was a tad bit slow. Food was good. We would return here for sure. Hadn't been at this location in over 2 years. 1st time, we met the Mayor of Charlotte there!
Place is filthy. 10 am and toilets don't even have toilet paper. No bagels, coffee empty,  and staff is lazy and or unenthusiastic
Excellent customer service.  Very clean and well maintained.  Great coffee.
This is the quality of food they will give you. Ordered 2 plain bagels sliced. This is an actual joke with what they gave me. Also hard as a rock and stale as can be. Do better with quality control.
The chunky Hispanic girl with the long nails was extremely rude and unprofessional will not be back because of her
Rundown, manager was crude and had an attitude, food was lesser quality than other locations
Busy at lunch
this place will never answer their phones.
Slow slow slow service ... workers in back talking personal situations not working ... almost like everywhere else at this point .. no believes in making customers happy AT ALL

Literally the only place I've been where I get lectured for not using the fast lane kiosk. Said they're too busy to help people at the register. I'm the only one in line. Sadly I go here because I like non crowded places to do work and the service is like this all the time.
This has to be the dirtiest Panera in Charlotte.
Small order took more 30 minutes to be ready

Staff was friendly, place is a little dirty but this steak & cheddar sandwich has got to be the worst sandwich deal in the city. The amount of meat they put on my sandwich makes a Subway sandwich look meaty. Couldn't have been more than 1 ounce of steak, it was tasty but it's all bread!
I got the 'you pick 2' with a caeser salad and a drink came up to $18!!!
Absolutely terrible value for the $$$!

I ordered from here twice and both times were a disappointment. The first time it was an hour late and the bagel was hard. The second time I order an asiago bagel and received a hard chocolate chip. The only way they could fix it was to give me a refund. But I'm still hungry. I won't be giving them another chance.

3/7: Ordered a latte and got a cup full of caramel. And a burnt bagel. I really wish doordash would choose a different facility.
Upon walking in the restaurant is extremely kept clean and organized.
Team lead was rude. Will not be going back to this store.

It is sad the management of this location is horrible. They never have a stocked bakery, service is slow, place is not cleaned well ect. Normally I don't have negative reviews but unfortunately this location earns it.

Avoid this place at all costs!! I recently just went to this Panera Bread Monday February 12 & couldn't believe what happened to me after going. I had an allergic reaction which caused my throat to close up & I broke out into hives & had to go the ER because of this. I have NO FOOD ALLERGIES WHATSOEVER, so it makes me wonder what are they doing to the food back there???? I ordered a ham & Gouda melt & a tomota soup, not even 5 minutes into eating I started to feel the allergic reaction. Not only did this happen but this location is also dirty tables weren't clean & they threw the bread for the soups in the bag not wrapping it up or anything. You can tell they don't care for cleanliness OR good service here at this Panera. You are better off going anywhere else but here.

The place was absolutely disgusting. As you walk to grab your drink there is a strong smell of pee. We had to clean our own table as every table was dirty even though there were 5 employees behind the counter standing around talking and on their phones. When we got our food it was not only gross but it looked nothing close to what it is supposed to look like. If I could give this place 0 stars I would. I do not recommend this place to anyone.
My beautiful place
Lower end of the Panera store scale. Food so so. Way too much dressing on the salad.
Very slow attendants
Great calm and nice

I was already having a bad day and then I got served THIS. It's literally inedible. How can you send that out with a straight face like you know damn well it's messed up and. looks terrible. If you hate your job that much just quit.
This place needs a cleaning.  Dirty pick up area, dirty restroom and take a look on the side of the beverage machines, sticky and dirty.

The staff was rude and acted like I was inconveniencing them by asking for the cup I paid for with my to go order. I ordered a southwest chicken cesar salad and when I opened it up the chicken looked and smelled vile. It was so bad that it made me lose my appetite so there's $15 down the drain. Do yourself a favor and go to a different location. With the prices at Panera and now this experience, I don't plan on ever returning. Yuck.

I went here today to pick up food for a delivery. I cannot comment on the accuracy of the taste, but the service was fast and the atmosphere is inviting. I am going to make it my mission to visit on a personal level to see how the food tastes.

Located in one of the wealthiest zip codes in Charlotte metro area (the Duke Mansion is just a couple of blocks away), yet this store has gone downhill while prices are up 30-40% from 2 years ago.  Ok, prices I cannot fault them for but the portion sizes have shrunk (hardly any meat on the sandwiches).. bread and cookies are still good though.  Still get 3 stars because running a restaurant is difficult even in a good economy.
Good Panera location. No issues
the time spent by staff insisting on patience better spent filling the empty coffee carafes?

Service was horrible. I needed help and I kept getting ignored. I was answered by the lady having her back towards me and to me that is very disrespectful. Last day in NC and this made it a horrible experience.

Upon walking in the restaurant is extremely kept clean and organized. The cashier was very patient and extremely professional. The ordering process was extremely easy.

The wait for our ( Aunt and I) food wasn't long at all. Although my aunt went to go and grab some more dressing for her salad, she went to approach the counter, and there were three employees who were just standing there, gossiping and not doing their job while also on their phones. But overall it was a great experience would highly recommend!!!
Always a good place to stop for a quick fresh lunch
Good food and wifi

Ms. Doris is so helpful! I often go to Panera for my company lunches and I often have individual orders. She is amazing at being able to separate out orders and take separate payments. She is 80 years old and just a complete delight to work with. She is informative and so helpful. This Panera is so lucky to have her on their team! She makes my job of getting company lunches a breeze. Don't ever let Ms. Doris go!
I love the Strawberry Chicken Salad. A bit pricey ($13). But yummy
A bunch of lazy you know what's work here. Girl at the pickup counter was doing everything she could to avoid doing her job. Hair down to her ankles too. Ridiculous

I walked in 5 min before closing as I had just gotten off work and was starving! All 3 employees were cleaning up as expected and after asking if they were still taking orders a friendly associate came to the counter and took my order and my food was made promptly and correct. I used to work in food service and I know how it is at Closing time so I appreciate this staff for showing great customer service I will be back again!
The young lady(Khirah) behind the counter was fantastic and went into the back and fixed us 2 cups of freshly brewed coffee. The coffee was as good as my friend had said it would be.
Service was a little slow with getting food ordered, but overall the same food and service was rendered as expected from Panera's.

The service at this location is lousy and not to mention customer service, they don't say hello, they are super derogatory, you can't tell them that the order is wrong or that something is missing because they look at you badly and answer you very rudely.  I don't know what it depends on. It's the last straw how they waste inputs.  It's very sad because the food is delicious.

Went in for dinner and ordered the pick 2. A green goddess salad and a soup. I ate the soup which was good then I got halfway through my salad and realized there was a hair in it :( I told the worker at the cashier and she only offered to replace salad or get "something else". She did not refund me my money. So sad as I was craving Panera and it's one of favorite options for dinner. Will
Not be stopping here again. Go somewhere else.

Associate Trainer running the register was super bossy. Told me there weren't onions on my sandwich when I asked to order with no onions (there are), told me I was wrapping my receipt around my gift card wrong...super weird.
Great service

I have not been a Panera recently. I stopped un here to grab a small bite while I was waiting for an appointment.  I was surprised it is nearly all self-serve. Place your order at a kiosk, get your cup, and wait for the text saying the order is ready and go to the counter to collect it. Overall, not a bad experience. I chose the turkey sandwich on sourdough. The sandwich was very good. Crisp onion, fresh tomatoes, and perfect greens. The bread was super fresh.  Would recamend this location.
Toasted Frontega Chicken!!!!
One of the workers tried to steal my to go order right in front of me - there needs to be a system for checking orders at this location.
Place was very dirty and the food took 30 minutes. The staff at the counter were talking and cussing while making the food. Not a good Panera experience.

The trash cans were overflowing, I requested a cup for water on my contactless dine in order and got nothing. Tables could have used a cleaning, employee packing orders at the window were just yelling names and weren't pleasant.

Went to location like I do every day with my wife, the girl that is working shift refused to take our order with to other employees standing in the conversation. We explained we didn't know how to use it, a lady came in front of us was early for her order and it notified her as it was done. So the cashier refused to take our order and said we have to wait for her to make a order for Novant. That's how we treat loyal customers. On this day of 4-27-23 at 6:10 am.

Employees were rude and not attentive. When I asked a question a simple question she looked at my like I was stupid. She never verbal answered me probably because she was to busy listening to her airpods.
This location is pretty dirty. Floors are very sticky, food on the floors . Tables look like they don't get cleaned. The drink machine is terrible. Will never come to this location again.

This place used to be clean, efficient, and fresh. Literally everything has went down hill. Waited 26 minutes on 2 bagels. Doordash/postmates orders take priority over in house guests, which is a bit disappointing. Look at how filthy everything is when you go in. Try calling them at ANY time of the day & see if anyone picks up the phone. So sad bc the prices sure haven't been lowered to reflect the experience from this store.

DO NOT order deliver. If there is any mistake there is no one that will answer the phone to help even if an item is missing. I called due to a drink missing the night of 3/2 the minute after my food was delivered and tried to go through the right process at 8:11 pm. No one answered the phone. I called 4 times then 2 more times on the phone where I work and still no answer. I tried calling at 6:30 am on 3/3 thinking they closed early even though the automated message said they were open and still no one would pick up the phone.

Hello so I went to panera today and one of the individuals told me that there was no bread bowl when I saw there were 5 on the counter. Then the individual told me that they don't give out the bread bowls after 12pm that is what this individual told me. I need a better answer than just saying you don't have anymore but you have 5 on the counter tops. Also when I tried to call after busy hours no one ever responded.
Double check your bag because they are not.

Walked in to see 3 employees talking to each other and after a few min one of them said "I am ready when you are" and her name was Kendra. Then our order was wrong. I love Panera but this location needs a little more love.
My spinach bacon souffle was not fully baked, and had to go inside for order after doing curbside pickup

This place should be monitored by corporate. They get the wrong orders and get an attitude if you ask if yours is coming up. My name was on the screen and when I asked and was told well there's 14 people ahead what do you expect and then she sucked her teeth. The customer service is lacking 100 percent. I truly feel the employees here need to be replaced asap or retrained. The place also looks disgusting like it has not been cleaned. Yuck! Please don't waste your time and buy food here.

I feel ripped off everytime I eat at Panera. Expensive for a very small serving. Coffee is good but the need more creamer options. Come on it wouldn't kill you to have french vanilla as a minimum offering.
One of my favorite places to eat

Guy on register really should take his ear buds out. Completely pooched the order and all he could say when it had to be brought back (carry out order) was "my bad"..... 2nd bad experience with 2 discrete Panara locations in area.

DON'T EVER WAIST YOUR TIME AT THIS LOCATION! The staff is very unprofessional and they couldn't even get my order of oatmeal right!! The oatmeal was cold at the bottom once I stirred it up so I took it back in and they heated up the same bowl that I brought in (contamination) and heated it up so much that my fruits withered! I didn't even bother taking it back in or asking for a refund so I just threw it away!! What a waist!! Proper management needs to be in full affect at this location!

$6.39 worth of a breakfast sandwich. Imagine someone's grandmother passes away the night prior and they finally try to eat something. My smoothie had yogurt for some odd reason but the manager was very kind and replaced it. I really just wanted to be in and out with this being my first public encounter, and to have some food in my stomach but, fail x2. Super hard bagel and a slithering of egg.
I love the sip club, but the cleanliness and customer service are a bit lacking.

Bad attitude from Adam today, the cashier who took my order.  Didn't ask for my rewards card/phone number. Seemed annoyed when I had to ask for a receipt. Wifi wasn't working, so I asked him if they do for sure have wifi. He said they do, I said the network wasn't showing up on my computer and all I got was a "huh...sorry." And then he walked away. I came here to get work done (business trip) and I know sometimes wifi has issues, that's fine! I get it. But I'm irritated by Adam's flippant and checked-out attitude in both interactions...My career involves giving excellent customer service so acknowledging people and meeting their needs is important to me. Empathy, acknowledgement, and actually listening to people goes a long way even if you can't directly resolve a situation. Now I'm off to another coffee shop.
Always clean, smells wonderful, great food
Good experience and a great breakfast.

Placed a to-go order with staff at register, it was not communicated a drink came with our order and our order was missing the sourdough bread bowl which was paid for extra. Overall a long wait, and missing items.

oh dear. I ordered a Caesar salad and got some kind of fruity dressing which pretty much ruined the flavor. Also I paid extra for avocado and found none on it. Doesn't seem that hard to get this right...

The young lady taking my order said nothing to me as I approached her, I gave her my order and she asked for it again...that's when I noticed she was texting and also had an airpod in her ear. As I paid I said thank you and got no response from her. My last time there
The staff are excellent as always. Otherwise it's pretty average. I also liked the coffee selection.

Waited a whole hour (which was my entire lunch break) for my food only for them to tell me, they didn't make it. Looked my
Order number up and saw that it was in the system just never made, the manager shrugged his shoulders and told a worker "ring it up again and we'll have to just remake it" no apologies, no remorse for the inconvenience they caused. I understand mistakes, especially in the food business, but this is not the first time I have waited 1 hour at this location.
Stood in line hungry for 18 minutes hungry And nobody took my order. Some girl walked out and saw me and just walk right back to the back without even saying a word. I hope this place closes
Great location
Typical panera menu but staff is not very friendly or helpful.

We order lunch here for our office quite frequently because it is the only thing that can deliver quick, and lately it is always a disaster. Our last delivery gave us the wrong sides and no salad dressing so I had to drive to the store after paying for delivery to get my items and they just handed them to me and said "sorry about that". The time before that our delivery was an hour and 15 minutes late...so obviously we were back with patients at that point and did not get to eat.
Great little spot to get some food and work.  Customer service is hit or miss tho
The only word I can come up with is "no". Super disappointing.

This location is horrible for leaving items off orders. Happens at least 50% of the time if not more. They actually have a system in place where the order packer is supposed to check off items and sign their name but unfortunately they don't utilize their own system. Management really needs to do a better job of overseeing the employees.
Always consistent
Ciara was absolutely great! Very good service store was clean staff was friendly and the Fountain Strawberry Mint Lemonade was everything!!

Cashier was extremely rude. Rushed me through payment and then acted like I was an inconvenience for daring to ask for a chance to apply my loyalty points. Will definitely think twice before returning to this particular location.
Friendly helpful staff.
Maneger is really rude

I'll be honest - the customer service could have been a little bit better, but over all I would still rate them 5/5. The food was great, hot and fresh and we didn't have to wait around long for the order. I would definitely visit this location again.
A little dirtier than most paneras
Love the soups here.
Nice cheese sandwiches and soup bowls

Have been a regular customer at this Panera for over three years, and was grateful that delivery has been avaiilable during the pandemic.  However, accuracy of orders has certainly slipped of late.  In the past couple of months, I have had two orders misdelivered to wrong addresses or wrong person, and missing items from orders.  I understand mistakes a busy times, but attempts to communicate with management have failed.  They do not answer their phones, not even when calling during their preferred non-busy times.  It wouldn't be so bad if they were not already on the expensive side, PLUS adding a $1.00 "convenience  fee" for the inconvenince of incorrect orders, plus delivery charge, plus tip for driver collected before delivery is made.  They have just priced and poor-serviced themselves out of my breakfast and lunch habit.

I'm done with Panera. Ordered a pizza and drink and tipped 30% for delivery since it was raining. I provided detailed instructions on where to park and how to enter the building. Delivery driver arrived with cold pizza and no $3 drink and wouldn't get out of his car to bring it in. Called me to come outside instead, even though he was parked within 5' of the front door. Didn't care he forgot the drink. I've been calling Panera for an hour and no one will answer the phone (something I've experienced at other locations as well). No drink, no refund. They can keep it. Not ordering from Panera again.
Clean. Good spot to enjoy meals or sit and work.  One of my go to work locations if I don't have to present. It can get loud at times.
Overpriced food of course. The expresso machine wasn't working that's even worse
I ordered a Greek salad with no onions, Poor excuse for a salad. Looks like something from the cafeteria and the dressing I order did not come with it they said something else.

This place almost killed my friend. She ordered an Asian salad with NO ALMONDS and they made it with them anyway. When we took it back, they just picked the almonds out (and even left some) instead of remaking it. We had to take it back for a third time, and they were very rude about the situation. Never coming here again.
Outstanding great service and great food

Guess you have to be a regular to get great customer service.   The lady in front of us clearly had breakfast bagels but we were told rudely, that breakfast was over at 10:30.... it was 11:05.  Would have ordered something else had the employee been kind and friendly.   Oh well,  will spend my dollars elsewhere.
Hot coffee.
Love the cinnamon crunch bagels and free coffee bagels!

Well, the pandemic makes all restaurant experiences a little awkward. But they're pretty good with orders, everything is served fairly quickly. Restrooms are clean.

Right now, when you place your order you get a pager to pick your own food at the counter in the back. I'd suggest grabbing your table and waiting maybe a minute or two after the pager vibrates to avoid people crowding the counter. You may want to order ahead to save time. It takes a few minutes on your phone and I can almost guarantee that your order will be 100% correct versus placing your order at the register. Although, it is rare when they get your order wrong. If they ever do, is usually because another customer took your order.
The food is worth it. Really!
As a suggestion, because Panera Bread's menu is mostly Carbs, you may want to order the smallest size and then split with someone; just for portion control. You should be able to substitute non-dairy for most drinks. And your order can be fully customized to your liking or dietary restrictions. The menu works much like it does at Starbucks, as far as substitutions go. And please don't be afraid to ask for substitute. They're staff is very friendly and understanding. It may take you a minute to explain what you want but they'll serve you patiently.
The bakery options change with the seasons, so you may want to try their pastries every once in a while.
So far, they have the best Chai Late I've had. There's also whole loaves of bread that you can ask to be sliced thick or thin. My daughter loves their Mac & Cheese and the sprouted grain bread.

Ordered you pick two salad and sandwich. Salad was okay but not great, as to be expected with Panera. But the sandwich was not a chipotle chicken avocado melt at all like I ordered! It was literally two pieces of plain bread not toasted or anything with half melted American cheese in the middle, barely even warm and wrapped up in soggy paper. I wish I could post the photos I took of it! I have never been so disgusted! So much so I am now rethinking my life choices including ever ordering Panera again, but especially never ordering from/going to this location again! This went straight in the trash. First time I ordered they forgot to give me my cookie I ordered (it was a door dash order) but I made the mistake of giving them a second chance. They did worse this time around. Don't eat here. Panera overall isn't what it used to be sadly.
It's Panera! Always clean environment and  friendly staff.
Great food. Needed paper towel dispenser to work..Hate drying hands on pants before I touch food.
They need to clean the bathroom this is really bad...pee everywhere never seen like this

Very good service, Eldora was very kind she was very cooperative with our orders.

Will visit again and recommend this place!!

Pathetic mask requirement Cant come inside without a mask but it's OK to take it off in order to eat where is the logic people? Had to leave the place. And I'm glad I did. Went to Starbucks next door and got my coffee with out mask. Don't be a sheep people!
Customer service needs to get better. They need to acknowledge incoming customers and be respectful

Do not order online from this store. They constantly forget parts of your order and cannot be reached by phone to fix it. They have never answered when I call. I'm only leaving this review because it is a recurrent issue and I'm sick of it. Today they missed half my order and there was a hair in what did arrive so I was left with no food to eat. It's totally gross to find someone's hair in your food. The in person experience may be different.
They make orders without following the queue.Very long, the maximum waiting time is always at least 30 minutes.Despite the fact that there are not so many people here

I have ordered office lunches from this location due to it being the only one that delivers to our business adress. Each time, I have had to call Panera Customer Service for a refund and I made sure that I took pictures of our entire order in the trash. The salads were missing key items, lettuce was wilted and brown, the grilled cheese sandwich looks as if a 3 yr old made it and the cheese doesn't melt. Neither side of the sandwich was grilled or toasted...soft white bread. I make sure that I go to the Cotswald location and the food quality is 180 degrees different. I don't see how Panera chain can support a franchise serving such a horrible quality of food (every time we have ordered). I will drive any day in lunch hour traffic before I ever order a delivery or any food from this location. I should have read the reviews because it seems this location doesn't care about their customers or what they spend their money on.
It was nice. I meet family for lunch. Check it out for your self.

The staff is nice, me and my friends always have bad luck here. I ordered a grilled cheese for myself, and when it was done there was only half a slice of cheese inside the bread! My friend got a salad and the lettuce was brown, almost black! Everything else we order is normal, it's always the grilled cheese and salad that somehow get messed up a bit. Decent, 5/10.
The staff is lost it's shouldn't take 30 minutes to make a sandwich I will never come back to this location
Such a great environment! Staff is always super helpful as well
Dirty.
Love Panera
You can't go wrong with the salads and sandwiches and any choice of coffee - cold or hot.
Always great I had the sausage breakfast sandwich, eggs over easy, on an asiago bagel and a bear claw with coffee.  No complaints, Panera is a solid go-to as always.

Ordered online through the Panera app a few times and the kitchen has been super slow. I know that we're in the Covid era, but today my DoorDash driver (whom Panera contracts with) had to wait there and missed out on other orders and tips! I called the restaurant and they were rude to me and didn't even answer the phone for their corporate contact. They may be better in person, but this is a fair warning for those ordering online.
Could have been cleaner.
Made me wait over and hour when I order 30 minutes before more people did
Food is always good. Curb service is awesome.
Friendly and quick service.

I love this place, Ms. Doris is the sweetest and always makes my visits the best.  She recommends things bc I tend to always stick to my favorites.  Ive tried even more of the menu just bc she makes me feel so special.

I have been coming here for about 10 years, and I don't know what has happened to this place. I can count on TWO hands the amount of times they have had to refund my money due to errors with my order or ordering on the app just to show up and they not even have the food available when I'm there 10 minutes after the place opened and 30 minutes after I ordered on the app. It's like you can order, but if you actually want the breakfast have a back up plan because it's 50/50 you'll even get it.

This was not a great experience, server was not pleasant, she got the order and got with us..
Will not go back ..
Delicious

After finishing dinner, we decided too have some coffee. My friend suggested Panera Bread. She loves their coffee. When we arrived, it was almost closing time and the coffee dispensers had already been taken in the back for cleaning. The young lady(Khirah) behind the counter was fantastic and went into the back and fixed us 2 cups of freshly brewed coffee. The coffee was as good as my friend had said it would be. The whole interior of the building was brightly lit and extremely clean. Everything was handicap accessible and appeared to be in good working order. If you took the time to read this review, please take a 1/2 second and click like. Thank you.

Delivery from this store is confusing when using Panera app. They use Door Dash for delivery, but the Panera app has no way to track delivery and orders will indicate "delivered" when it has not been delivered. Don't bother calling store; they hung up on us. We called back and Maurice, Steve, and Kema (GM) were all too busy to help us. Going to Yafo...
The service could be better

This store steals from delivery drivers

I had a huge catering order ($300+) yesterday from this location. When I arrived to pick it up, they said the customer called in to add more things on a second order and to leave a generous tip for the driver, and that they merged the orders together so they wouldn't have to assign a second Doordash driver. After I completed the delivery, my app only showed a $2.76 tip. Which is fine, a tip is extra anyway but that is extremely unusual amount for an order that large. So I stopped by the Panera afterwords and they told me yes there should've been a $47 tip that was on the second part. So after a night and day full of back and forth with Doordash and Panera customer service, it's Panera's own customer service that tells me the second part was processed as a store pickup, therefore the tip never entered the Doordash system to get to me, and whatever worker at the store kept it for themselves. That's theft. I know times are hard for a lot of us, but you didn't earn that money. I hope you're proud of yourself. Stay away from this Panera
Very dirty, and ran out of rolls at noon.   Also, kicthen staff was not friendly at all
It is what it is but mine's out of bagels and basically it's all about the turkey sandwich
Had food delivered from Panera. The food tasted like cigarettes and the bag smelled. Didn't even make the sandwich correctly.

I come in here frequently to study after work and the place has just become an absolute disaster. There's tables with trays left that are unattended, the staff is not very friendly and they have employees sleeping in dining area, which is extremely unprofessional and projects a bad image as a whole.

I love Panera, but this location is terribly managed. Orders take FOREVER to be prepared. Everything seems disorganized every time I come. The floors are sticky. It's a real shame this is the closest location to me.
Always good

Despite many of my coworkers telling me to never order from this location again I did anyway. Pictured is my receipt, my order receipt and the actual sandwich(the salad was just as I asked it to be). This was my second time ordering and my sandwich is wrong, I didn't leave a review the first time but I thought I would share this one. Maybe they are better if you go in based on the positive reviews but that shouldn't mean those of us who order online or for delivery don't deserve our food to be correct as well.

Nasty bathroom, somebody shaved in there and nobody cleaned it (although place was empty and people was doing nothing)
Food was poor and flavorless.
Food was amazing, very clean ....

I have never experienced a business going so far out of its way to remedy a mistake. I ordered delivery today and my order was not correct - I decided to call because I had actually paid extra to customize a sandwich that arrived plain. They ending up delivering to my home a new (correct) sandwich, a bag of chips and two cookies on the house, and a refund in cash. I am incredibly impressed and appreciative!
Quick friendly service
Service was courteous and fast

My Green Goddess Cobb Salad with Chicken was fantastic today. It was so good I had to copy and paste all that was in it. All I wanted was a salad coming after Thanksgiving day. The Green Goddess was a perfect choice. Good job Panera @ Providence Rd.

Chicken raised without antibiotics, arugula, romaine, kale and radicchio blend, grape tomatoes and pickled red onions tossed in Green Goddess dressing and topped with avocado, bacon and cage-free hard-boiled egg. (Nutritional values below are base...

I used to really enjoy this Panera but the last 3 times I've gone, the service was very disappointing. It will take 20- 30 minutes for my order to come out (for soup) and on two occasions my order was wrong. I'm not sure if management changed hands over the past year or two but I avoid this Panera and choose to go to the one uptown or in Cotswold instead.
More parking spaces at the back

I am not normally one to write a bad review. I dont like it when people do.  And I am very patient when people are taking my order but: It took the worker sooo long to get our order placed into the computer. When I walked over to look at the pastries she yelled at more for separating from my lunch date (apparently I needed to stand next to him the whole time). She would not let me choose a pastry.
The coffee was cold. The service was unacceptable. I love panera but this location is not one I would go back to.

Used to be better managed, It seems orders are moved to ready soon after it has been placed and yet it's being worked on. Food quality is good but compare to other branches this store has room to improve.

I have been a regular patron of this Panera for over four years and have forgiven a lot of mistakes, usually having to do with forgotten food items or missing components to salads...but the food has always tasted fresh and the management has always been friendly and apologetic so I've overlooked these shortcomings.  Sadly last night was unforgivable and I will not be returning.  My order for curbside was not ready after waiting for several minutes past the designated time so I entered and waited at the passthrough window.  The general state of the interior was unkempt and dirty.  The prep cooks wore their masks over their mouths but not their noses, frequently reaching up to adjust their masks or wipe their faces with gloved hands and then scooping their hands into salad materials or deli meats. While waiting I was casually informed they were out of bread (??) and I would be receiving chips with my soups and when the order was finally ready after getting into my car I realized the grilled cheese wasn't included in the bag.  Upon returning and informing the employees I was missing my grilled cheese they casually responded "I know" and handed me a crumpled wad of brown paper, presumably with the grilled cheese in it. Frankly this last issue was the wake up call I needed to realize this place is a health hazard.  I came to my senses and returned the food to the front counter, leaving empty handed.  Last night my family and I were all a little hungry but at least we weren't risking our health.

If the above review doesn't concern you and you would still like to patronize this place, please take my seasoned advice and always review your pickup order in full before leaving the store.  Nine times out of ten there is at least one missing or incorrect item.

Honestly don't bother ordering online or to go here. The last 2 or 3 times going we got our food it took 30+ minutes on off times. We sat for 45 minutes one time waiting for a simple order and when I went to check a girl back there was texting blatantly. This time going to order food it was "preparing" for 20 minutes and people who ordered after me received there food first. Ill happily drive a little farther to not go here again.

Not everyone is perfect, and during these times everyone is susceptible to frustration; however, today, the manager (or he could've been the proprietor) was very generous. Very encouraging to pay it forward. Thx
Good food. Quick service but rude patrons
Nice and easy in and out location.

I had a very stressful few months, so with me, kindness goes a long way. I personally love when I enter a place of business, the employee is welcoming. I met an amazing, charismatic, polite employee; her name is Kyara (I hope I spelled her name right). The young lady was so polite and made it her personal business to help us. If she isn't the manager of this place, she should be, because she is amazing.

The person who take you orders is too rude..
Food ok coffee cold
Bad management trying to string out a dollar.
Hot food and fast service.
Super friendly staff!

Food is not good. Didn't get the condiment for my sandwich which made it taste horrible. I even asked for extra to show you how much I like. Didn't get enough dressing for my salad. The Grilled cheese was bland. Ordered it through curbside and took 7 minutes to get to me which I thought odd since it made me pick out a specific time. Trying to have a convenient weekday dinner and this place is not gonna work. Won't be back.

Busy time chaos with backed up orders, longer than usual wait time for rapid pick up...burnt bagel, wrong cream cheese, yogurt sloppily thrown together...no straw for beverage...overall worst experience I've ever had at a Panera Bread.
Very good

Ordered food for delivery a few days ago.  Order was missing 3 cookies that I was charged for and never arrive.  I don't see any way on website to report issue with order.  In the past when I have tried to call, I haven't gotten answer.  I will never order delivery from then again after being charged for several items that were missing from our order.
Love their pick two

If I could leave 0 stars I would! Awful and hateful customer service. I got an alert saying my order was 4 minutes away, for 45 minutes! Then I got an alert that my order has arrived, I went to pick it up, it was never delivered. I called literally 10 times before anyone found it worth their time to answer the phone. I was very upset, no apology or nothing! I requested a refund and I will NEVER eat or order anything from Panera ever again. The prices they charge and the customer service they provide not worth my time or my money. I rather go and spend my money where they appreciate their customers.
Good thing that I have Panera rewards
Straight horrendous very bad would never come here again. Very cold food almost as icy as my chain. Dude in the red shirt was very rude.
Close by work
Fresh, above average food. Super nice staff and the unsweetened, plum ginger hibiscus tea is delicious!  Pick two is a nice way to tr different items.
Awesome food and customer service!
very friendly employees, huge selection of pastries and well stocked coffee bar. one of these best panera bread's in this area.
The souffles are delish!

A typical Panera, food is always consistent and friendliness of staff varies from employee to employee. There's one particular manager who really tries hard and I witnessed him order (and pay for) an Uber for an employee who usually walked home but it was cold and pouring rain that day. Deducted one star because the handicapped parking is very poorly thought out and sometimes their delivery drivers park in handicapped spaces.

You would have gotten five stars but there was a big tall white guy came and threw paper supposed to threw it in the trash but it went on to another countertop and he didn't wipe it off I thought that was very despicable and I almost didn't order food from you that was my first time coming
It was my husband and I first time visiting. We really enjoyed the soups and great customer service. Thank you Panera Bread.

I ordered a caramel iced latte. It tasted different than what I'd received in the past, and my facial expression must've expressed that. I was going to keep what I had, but the cashier caught me before I could walk out of the door. She asked me about my drink, and insisted that they make another one that met my expectations. They improved my drink, and the cashier turned my mediocre experience into an excellent one.
Thanks for the food poisoning! I had to miss an important exam today..
Just got home and am experiencing a power outage so thought I'd stop at Panera on my way since I can't cook... they forgot my bread which is my favorite part! Thanks guys.
Great place to eat & chill
Everything about this place is geeat, I love the veggie options the best

This Panera puts the "Panera" name to shame.
If you want a bagel then do not go here. They are consistently out of bagels during regular mornings, weekdays and weekends.  I guess they're either too lazy to make more or are trying save a penny.
So much for being a "bakery."
Crew can be scattered at times.
Same old tasteless food. High prices.
Nice atmosphere, nice selections of bread
Great my first time

It took more than 15 minutes to get my to go order. Also the spine of the romaine ended up in my salad and my bread looks like it was ripped by hand instead of cut with a knife. The person who took our order was wonderful but the staff taking care of the food did not seem to care at all how many people were waiting and were joking and laughing loudly about how customers names were pronounced.

Great, healthy food with wonderful options!
Jay was very friendly and she went above and beyond to help us out with getting something to drink that would cure this nasty bug we have been passing around for weeks!
The Male (manager.?) was amazing as well!
This is by far the best location we've been to...
Their food is the best

I ordered a baja grain bowl for delivery to my work and when it was delivered there was hardly any food in the bowl. And when i tried to call and it is between 11-1 you can't talk to anyone. I don't mind paying $9.00 for the bowl but not if there is hardly any food in the bowl. And i have personally ordered this many times in the panera bread's myself so i know how much food is supposed to be in the bowl. Won't order this for delivery again!!!
This location missed the mark the day I went.  Small portions,  old lettuce,  sandwich looked slapped together.

This is a really cool Panera Bread location.  This place is always where you can go to get a meal that is very healthy.   The surrounding area of this Panera Bread location is a very happening part of town.

Only 6 types of bagels on display and 2 of those contained only 2 bagels each.  6 baskets were empty.  Server didn't seem to care when we asked her if they had any additional (i.e. plain, sesame, poppy seed, etc.). The response was an emphatic "no".  When we paid for our muffin and tea that  big old gratuity screen sure came up!  I gave an emphatic "no" to any gratuity!  The young lady doing the cleaning was doing a great job.

Ordered and paid for an upgrade on my sandwich which was ignored by the cook.
Something is wrong with the machine or water they use to make espresso drinks. 2nd time in a row (but months apart) my drink tastes like sodium--maybe too much chlorine in the water, or maybe cleaning products they are using on the machine.
Too expensive for this level of quality
Please join this decade and offer gluten free bread options.

Manager made it up with free tea but the hot water was cold. Haha switched to a cofde iznyead which is better than Starbucks coffee for sure. Anyway food took awhile even though no one was there practically in the rain. But the food absolutely delicious.
Good coffee and pastry
Great Place
Arrived at 10am for breakfast to have staff tell us they were no longer serving breakfast. Weekdays until 10:30 and weekends until 11am. We came in on a Sunday.
Mmm mmmm good
Great
Friendly staff
All Panera Breads are great.

Always love eating here. You can choose from a variety of clean, healthy foods. The menu offers a great variety of items to mix and match to your liking. You also receive rewards points to use towards later purchases and you earn free food items. Double check your order before leaving especially the Concord location near Northeast hospital.
Yummy food

My go-to for a quick healthy lunch, and most especially meeting clients and employees for a coffee and/or a meal. I LOVE Panera! Thank you for your great menu and super-nice employees! The tables are always clean, and the service is the best! Prices are great for the quality that you provide. THANK YOU!

Fast food but this table, the floor and most of the booths are simply dirty. Food left on plates, crumbs on the floor and in the booths....Kiosks for ordering don't work...this place needs a thorough update/cleaning.
Wow me encanto  el smoothie de fresa  y banana  ... y las ensaladas deliciosas  buena atencion y todo el establecimiento limpio se los recomiendo
Always fresh and tasty!
It's okay if you want a $15 sandwich and the menu is bad

The orders was incorrect and the staff was disrespectful at best . Employee gripes loudly about cleaning the table which was filthy when seated while I was getting my toddler cleaned up, I hadn't had time to  dump my trash as I usually do. I will no longer be returning to the franchise.
Good customer service
Me encantan las sopas de hay en especial la de brocoli
Pricey but good
Convenient place to grab a meal. Staff is friendly and fast
Always good. Always professional and if it's wrong... they will make it right!!!
Amazing staff and good service
Decent food, the dining area needed to be cleaned.
Had lunch with my good friend. Food and prices are good. I will go again and again.

Kitchen staff got our order wrong today. Instead of fixing it, they made me bring it back to the counter (did not trust the server's report) and then treated me like I was lying even though food was in front of them as well as actual receipt so discrepancy was obvious. When I requested to fix both meals, the cook had guts to call me rude. Just like that: "You're rude!". I requested to speak to their manager who was flustered and left us feeling like we've caused him the greatest annoyance. We were served fixed meals but that's about it. No apology, no "how can we make this better" or "how about refund for your bad experience"? We left feeling like nobody really cared about their customers at this location. Not a good place to be; especially with wait staff frequently sleeping in patrons booths etc.
Manager could care less about his customers and appears to hate his job.
My first experience with ordering at a kiosk here. The food came out a reasonable pace and was delicious. I ordered a chicken Caesar salad.
15 min wait for a salad with 1 person in front of me
Always clean, always excellent food.  Servers are thoughtful.
Great as always.
Broccoli- cheddar soup is awesome
Excellent food and hot chocolate!
Call ahead order was ready on time. Food tasted good, but the portions were small for the price paid.
Good coffee and bagel.  Nice fireplace.

It was close to 11 am when a friend took us here (Providence Rd Panera Bd) to pick up a lunch. Despite the late hour a variety of their wonderful egg souffles remained available, and despite the early hour they'd already prepared their famous broccoli cheddar soup. Staff were kind and quick. The place felt bright & clean. We enjoyed a nourishing meal, no downsides.
That Broccoli and Cheddar soup is truly scrumptous. It's so warm and fulfilling. They really make sure is full of Broccoli and Cheese! I recommend it 100%!!!!
Placed my online order at 1:21pm. It is 3:22pm and I am still waiting for a hot meal.

Ordered on the touch screen, but there were no instructions about where to pick up our order... I had to ask. Friendly staff, clean place, good food, but the self-ordering procedure needs to be more obvious to first time users.
Excellent bread, and superb sandwiches.
It was peaceful and the people were really nice
Creepy.
Delicious !

After a long drive my family and I wanted to stop to get some food, so we chose Panera. After we ordered and went to get our drinks a lady had already shut them all off an hour before they close. Pure eagerness to leave work. When our food was ready, one of our orders was incorrect and when we approached them to ask for new food the workers were in the back on facetime giggling. Very professional. Another food item we order came without it's salad dressing, and we were served with a plastic fork that broke, because they apparently didn't want to have to wash anymore silverware. Classy. The overall attitude, and presentation of the workers was poor, the chores that were being done should have occurred well after the restaurant was closed.

Fantastic food and such nice employees here. From the young lady at the register, to the person that served me. Had a good conversation and was on my way! Food was excellent. Would recommend parking at the Starbucks nextdoor as the little parking in front of Panera is tricky
I go just to order loaves of bread. It's so good that I can't go back to buying bread from the grocery store.
Food is solid. Delivery can be dicey.  But it's Panera so you know what you are getting
Bad service

Apparent issues with this location, This is the SECOND time I have ordered online and then not received my food until 2 hrs later or more . Nobody answers the phone when you try to call. Had to call customer service to cancel my order. Will NOT order from this location again.
SAVE YOURSELF THE TROUBLE!
